timeline.title: Deletion Timeline
timeline.description: Service access will be immediately suspended after requesting account deletion, and all personal data will be completely deleted within 7 days. Backup system data will be deleted within 30 days.

legalRetention.title: Legally Required Data Retention
legalRetention.description: In accordance with applicable laws, some data must be retained for the legal retention period:

0.title: Service abuse records (1 year)
0.description: Records for preventing fraudulent registration and usage

1.title: Consumer complaint handling records (3 years)
1.description: Dispute resolution records under E-commerce Act

2.title: Website log records (3 months)
2.description: Access records under Communications Secrets Protection Act

irreversible.title: Irreversible Consequences
irreversible.description: Once your account is deleted, the following consequences will occur and cannot be undone:

consequences.0: All personal data and content will be permanently deleted
consequences.1: Previous data cannot be recovered even if you re-register with the same information
consequences.2: No data can be restored through any means after deletion

faq.helpHowToStart: How do I get started with Hearty?
faq.helpHowToStartContent:
1. Download the app and sign up
2. Select your age group and interests
3. Set up a simple profile
4. Record your first voice message
5. Enjoy warm conversations with others

It may feel awkward at first, but you'll get used to it quickly!
faq.helpProfileSetup: How do I set up my profile?
faq.helpProfileSetupContent:
Setting up your profile is easy:

1. Choose a nickname (not your real name)
2. Select your age group
3. Choose up to 5 interests
4. Select your communication style

You can change all information anytime in 'My Profile'.
faq.helpAgeGroupSelection: Why do I need to select an age group?
faq.helpAgeGroupSelectionContent:
Selecting your age group helps you connect with people of similar or different generations.

â€¢ Choose a similar age group for generational empathy
â€¢ Choose a different age group to hear new stories

Age group is just a matching criterionâ€”you can talk to anyone freely.
faq.helpRecordVoice: How do I record a voice message?
faq.helpRecordVoiceContent:
Recording a voice message is simple:

1. Tap the mic button at the bottom
2. Hold the record button and speak
3. Release the button when done
4. Listen to your recording and send if satisfied

Speak clearly in a quiet place for best quality.
faq.helpPlayVoice: How do I listen to voice messages?
faq.helpPlayVoiceContent:
To listen to received voice messages:

1. Select the message you want to hear
2. Tap the play button (â–¶)
3. Adjust volume with your phone's buttons
4. Tap play again to replay

Use earphones for clearer sound.
faq.helpVoiceQuality: I can't hear the voice well
faq.helpVoiceQualityContent:
If you can't hear the voice message well:

1. Increase your phone's volume
2. Try using earphones or headphones
3. Move to a quieter place
4. Check for dust on the speaker
5. Restart the app

If the issue persists, contact support.
faq.helpHowMatchingContent:
Hearty's matching system:

1. Matches you based on interests and age group
2. Connects you with people with similar tastes or experiences
3. Offers diverse matches for new connections
4. Start conversations via voice messages after matching

Matching is safe and protects your privacy.
faq.helpMatchingPreference: How can I change my matching settings?
faq.helpMatchingPreferenceContent:
To change matching settings:

1. Go to 'My Profile'
2. Select 'Matching Settings'
3. Set your preferred age range
4. Add or change interests
5. Adjust communication style

Changes apply from your next match.
faq.helpNoMatchingContent:
If you're not getting matched:

1. Check if your profile is complete
2. Select more diverse interests
3. Broaden your age range
4. Try again at a different time
5. Check your internet connection

If still not matched, try again later.
faq.helpSafetyGuidelines: How can I use Hearty safely?
faq.helpSafetyGuidelinesContent:
Safety guidelines:

1. Never share personal info (real name, address, phone)
2. Politely decline meeting requests
3. Report any inappropriate messages
4. Block suspicious users
5. Remember, all ages can hear voice messages

Your safety is our top priority.
faq.helpReportUser: How do I report a problematic user?
faq.helpReportUserContent:
To report a user:

1. Long-press their message
2. Select 'Report'
3. Choose a reason
4. Provide details
5. Tap 'Submit Report'

Reports are reviewed within 24 hours and action is taken if needed.
faq.helpPrivacyProtection: How is my personal information protected?
faq.helpPrivacyProtectionContent:
Personal information protection:

1. Only your nickname is shown to others
2. Voice messages are encrypted and stored securely
3. No personal data is shared with third parties
4. All data is deleted upon account deletion
5. Regular security checks are performed

See our Privacy Policy for details.
faq.helpChangeNickname: How do I change my nickname?
faq.helpChangeNicknameContent:
To change your nickname:

1. Go to 'My Profile'
2. Tap 'Edit Profile'
3. Select the nickname field
4. Enter a new nickname (2-10 characters)
5. Tap 'Save'

You can change your nickname once a month. Duplicates are not allowed.
faq.helpDeleteAccount: How do I delete my account?
faq.helpDeleteAccountContent:
To delete your account:

1. Go to 'My Profile'
2. Tap 'Settings'
3. Select 'Account Management'
4. Tap 'Delete Account'
5. Select a reason and confirm

âš ï¸ All data will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered.
faq.helpForgotPasswordContent:
To reset your password:

1. On the login screen, select 'Forgot Password'
2. Enter your registered email
3. Check your email for the reset link
4. Set a new password
5. Log in with your new password

Check your spam folder if you don't see the email.
faq.helpAppNotWorkingContent:
To fix app issues:

1. Restart the app
2. Restart your phone
3. Update to the latest version
4. Check your phone's storage
5. Check your internet connection

If the problem persists, contact support.
faq.helpAudioPermission: How do I set voice recording permissions?
faq.helpAudioPermissionContent:
How to set voice permissions:

Android:
1. Settings > Apps > Select Hearty
2. Permissions > Allow Microphone

iOS:
1. Settings > Privacy > Microphone
2. Allow Hearty app

You must allow permission to record voice messages.
faq.helpSlowAppContent:
To improve app speed:

1. Close other apps
2. Restart your phone
3. Check your Wi-Fi connection
4. Free up phone storage
5. Update to the latest version

Older phones may be slower.
